Package DAO

Class MenuItemDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • DAO.MenuItemDAO
  • public class MenuItemDAO
extends java.lang.Object
    The `MenuItemDAO` class provides methods to interact with the menu_items table in the database.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      MenuItemDAO​(java.sql.Connection conn)
      Constructs a MenuItemDAO with the specified database connection.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      int AddMenuItem​(java.lang.String itemName, java.lang.String category, java.math.BigDecimal price)
      Adds a new menu item to the database.
      int DeleteMenuItem​(int menuItemId)
      Deletes a menu item from the database.
      java.util.List<MenuItem> GetAllMenuItems()
      Retrieves all menu items from the database.
      MenuItem GetMenuItemById​(int menuItemId)
      Retrieves a menu item by its ID.
      MenuItem GetMenuItemByName​(java.lang.String itemName)
      Retrieves a menu item by its name.
      int UpdateMenuItem​(int menuItemId, java.lang.String newName, java.math.BigDecimal newPrice, java.lang.String newCategory)
      Updates an existing menu item in the database.

    • Method Detail

      • GetAllMenuItems

        public java.util.List<MenuItem> GetAllMenuItems()
                                         throws java.sql.SQLException
        Retrieves all menu items from the database.
        Returns:
        a list of all menu items
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if a database access error occurs

      • GetMenuItemById

        public MenuItem GetMenuItemById​(int menuItemId)
                         throws java.sql.SQLException
        Retrieves a menu item by its ID.
        Parameters:
        menuItemId - the ID of the menu item to be retrieved
        Returns:
        the menu item with the specified ID, or null if not found
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if a database access error occurs

      • GetMenuItemByName

        public MenuItem GetMenuItemByName​(java.lang.String itemName)
                           throws java.sql.SQLException
        Retrieves a menu item by its name.
        Parameters:
        itemName - the name of the menu item to be retrieved
        Returns:
        the menu item with the specified name, or null if not found
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if a database access error occurs

      • AddMenuItem

        public int AddMenuItem​(java.lang.String itemName,
                       java.lang.String category,
                       java.math.BigDecimal price)
                throws java.sql.SQLException
        Adds a new menu item to the database.
        Parameters:
        itemName - the name of the menu item
        category - the category of the menu item
        price - the price of the menu item
        Returns:
        the generated ID of the new menu item, or -1 if the insertion failed
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if a database access error occurs

      • UpdateMenuItem

        public int UpdateMenuItem​(int menuItemId,
                          java.lang.String newName,
                          java.math.BigDecimal newPrice,
                          java.lang.String newCategory)
                   throws java.sql.SQLException
        Updates an existing menu item in the database.
        Parameters:
        menuItemId - the ID of the menu item to be updated
        newName - the new name of the menu item
        newPrice - the new price of the menu item
        newCategory - the new category of the menu item
        Returns:
        1 if the menu item was successfully updated, 0 otherwise
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if a database access error occurs

      • DeleteMenuItem

        public int DeleteMenuItem​(int menuItemId)
                   throws java.sql.SQLException
        Deletes a menu item from the database.
        Parameters:
        menuItemId - the ID of the menu item to be deleted
        Returns:
        1 if the menu item was successfully deleted, 0 otherwise
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if a database access error occurs
